name: wp-cloudflare-dashboard
description: A Cloudflare Analytics Dashboard for Wordpress.

scripts.dist: git checkout -b dist && git checkout dist && git push origin dist && git branch -D dist && git push origin :dist && git checkout -B dist && rm -rf .bowerrc .editorconfig .eslintrc.js .eslintrc.json .gitignore .sass-lint.yml .travis.yml .yo-rc.json bower.json composer.lock Gruntfile.js Gulpfile.js phpcs.xml phpunit.xml README.md tests node_modules bin assets/README.md assets/css/sass assets/js assets/repo includes/README.md  && composer install && rm -rf .gitignore composer.lock .DS_Store assets/.DS_Store && git add -A && git commit -m $(grep -m1 version package.json | awk -F: '{ print $2 }' | sed 's/[", ]//g') && git push origin dist
